analysis.description:

	-transfer (/unique_chucks/4/0x42a952ac23d020610355cf425d0dfa58295287be.sol#110-114)

DBToken.accountNoneFrozenAvailable (/unique_chucks/4/0x42a952ac23d020610355cf425d0dfa58295287be.sol#312-363) uses timestamp for comparisons
